pages.text: 终于等到了饭点，干饭人干饭时间🔊 var btn=document.getElementById('btn'); var audio=document.getElementById('myaudio'); var tag = false; btn.onclick = function(){ if(tag){ audio.pause(); tag = false; }else{ audio.play(); tag = true; }}

posts.title: 使用到的插件
posts.text: 说句话 hexo-deplayer-gitGitHub上传插件npm install hexo-deployer-git --save hexo-abbrlink生成唯一链接npm install hexo-abbrlink --save_config.yml 配置文件 123456# permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/# permalink_defaults:permalink: posts/:abbrlink.htmlabbrlink: # alg: crc32 #算法： crc16(default) and crc32 rep: dec #进制： dec(default) and hex 生成站点地图SSRnpm install hexo-generator-feed --save_config.yml 配置文件 123456789# RSS订阅feed: type: atom path: atom.xml limit: 20 hub: content: content_limit: 140 content_limit_delim: ' ' 本地搜索支持$ npm install hexo-generator-searchdb_config.yml 配置文件next在主题开启即可 12345search: path: search.xml field: post content: true format: html 日历插件https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-calendarnpm install theme-next/theme-next-calendar在next主题配置文件_config.yml配置 不怎么好看，停用了🙃 12345678CloudCalendar: enable: true language: zh-CN single: true root: /calendar/ calendarCdn: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/theme-next/theme-next-calendar/calendar.min.js langCdn: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/theme-next/theme-next-calendar/languages.min.js #disableSidebar: false pdf使用{% pdf url %}
